title: Packet loss issue
body: I have done a tracert on the oce server (59.100.95.210) and all of the prompts return good ms its only when i get to the ip 3.50.11.97 that i repeatedly get "* * * request timed out." Is there a way I can go around this particular ip because at the moment the game is unplayable. Anybodys thoughts pelase?
